ORDINANCE COMMITTEE
COMMITTTEE MEETING
~ MINUTES ~
Tuesday, February 16, 2021

1:00 PM

Sullivan Chamber

The Ordinance Committee will meet to conduct a public hearing to continue discussion on the
Alewife zoning petition.
Attendee Name
Dennis J. Carlone

Present

Alanna Mallon
Marc C. McGovern
Patricia Nolan

Documents
2.

A Zoning Petition Has been received from Arvind Srinivasan regarding zoning language relative to
the Alewife Quadrangle Northwest overlay

to the full City Council with no recommendation/
RESULT:
YEAS:
NAYS:
REFERRED [5 TO 4]
Carlone, McGovern, Siddiqui, Simmons, Toomey
Mallon, Nolan, Sobrinho-Wheeler, Zondervan

Next: 3/1/2021 5:30 PM

3.

A communication was received from Jacob Vance, regarding Quad NW AOD1 Commitment Letter.

4.

A communication was received from Councillor Simmons, transmitting questions for the Ordinance
Committee meeting on February 16, 2021.

5.

A communication was received from Jacob Vance, regarding MassDOT Alewife Bridge Zoning
Support Letter.

6.

Sundry communications from the public for the Ordinance Committee meeting on February 16,
2021.

7.

A communication was received from Jacob Vance, Senior Development Manager at Cabot, Cabot &
Forbes transmitting a presentation for the Ordinance Committee meeting on February 16, 2021.
